 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשָׁא‎</span>] **verb** ==lend on interest, or usury, be a creditor== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***postpone, delay; sell on credit***; \|\| form of I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשָׁה‎</span>, see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75oo»§ 75oo</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשֶׁא‎</span> (analogous <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span>) [[1Sam.22.2|1Sam 22:2]] every man that had ***a creditor***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲשֶׁר נשֶׁא בוֺ‎</span> [[Isa.24.2|Isa 24:2]] ***against whom is a ceditor***, and plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשְׁאִים‎</span> [[Neh.5.7|Neh 5:7]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשִׁים‎</span> [[BDB#Qr|Qr]], from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשָׁה‎</span>), + accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשָּׁא‎</span>. **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹאיַֿשִּׁיא אוֺיֵב בּוֺ‎</span> [[Ps.89.23|Ps 89:23]] ***an enemy shall not act the creditor against him, make exactions of him*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְעַנֶּנּוּ‎</span>). — [[1Kgs.8.31|1Kgs 8:31]]; [[2Chr.6.22|2Chr 6:22]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשׂא‎</span> **Qal 1 b** (5). 



 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשָׁה‎</span> **verb** ==lend, become a creditor== (compare I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשׁא‎</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשִׁ֫יתִי‎</span> [[Jer.15.10|Jer 15:10]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשׁוּ‎</span> v[[Jer.15.10|Jer 15:10]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשֶׁה‎</span> [[Exod.22.24|Exod 22:24]] + 4 t.; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשִׁים‎</span> [[Neh.5.10|Neh 5:10]]; [[Neh.5.11|Neh 5:11]] + v[[Neh.5.7|Neh 5:7]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשְׁאִים‎</span>, see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשׁא‎</span>), suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺשַׁי‎</span> [[Isa.50.1|Isa 50:1]] — ***lend***, usually with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> person: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹאנָֿשִׁיתִי וְלֹאנָֿשׁוּבִֿי‎</span> [[Jer.15.10|Jer 15:10]] ***I have not lent, and they have not lent to me***, [[Deut.24.11|Deut 24:11]]; [[Neh.5.7|Neh 5:7]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]]; + accusative of congnate meaning with verb), v[[Neh.5.10|Neh 5:10]] v[[Neh.5.11|Neh 5:11]] (both + accusative of thing); participle as substantive ***creditor, usurer*** [[Exod.22.24|Exod 22:24]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[2Kgs.4.1|2Kgs 4:1]]; [[Isa.24.2|Isa 24:2]]; [[Isa.50.1|Isa 50:1]]; [[Ps.109.11|Ps 109:11]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַשֶּׁה בְּ‎</span> [[Deut.15.2|Deut 15:2]] ***who lendeth to*** his neighbour; 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּשֶּׁה בְּ‎</span> [[Deut.24.10|Deut 24:10]] when ***thou lendest to*** thy neighbour (+ accusative of congnate meaning with verb).
